title: City Inside/Out: Council Edition - December 2018
description: What impact will construction of the new Seattle Center arena have on a city already in the midst of some major traffic problems? What's the path forward for the City Council after some tough questions from a federal judge regarding police reform? And what will it mean to have more upzones in your neighborhood? Council President Bruce Harrell and Councilmember Mike O'Brien join host Brian Callanan to answer these questions and more on the December episode of Council Edition.
